channel.title: 508 client annoying error
channel.description:
Srry if this sounds stupid or some1 else already answer, but i recently got into private server hosting and i have this annoying problem with 508 clients. i would log in and everything is fine, but say 5 minutes later i get disconnected and i totally cant load the client anymore. so i check to see anything different bout the client and i then notice that the compliling was kinda weird. i no for a fact that i got my java setting rights as well as the java used for the compiler, but i get sone weird error saying: note: some input files are uncheck or unsafe operation note: recompile blah blah blah
Any1 no a nice solution for poor old me? :| :|

item.title: 508 client annoying error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“aznblaze, post:1, topic:325341”]Srry if this sounds stupid or some1 else already answer, but i recently got into private server hosting and i have this annoying problem with 508 clients. i would log in and everything is fine, but say 5 minutes later i get disconnected and i totally cant load the client anymore. so i check to see anything different bout the client and i then notice that the compliling was kinda weird. i no for a fact that i got my java setting rights as well as the java used for the compiler, but i get sone weird error saying:
note: some input files are uncheck or unsafe operation
note: recompile blah blah blah

Any1 no a nice solution for poor old me? :|[/quote]

It’s not an error, it’s basically just the compiler telling you there’s a better way to do what you’re doing. if you do javac -Xlint:deprecation it will show you the deprecated methods

Read full topic
